pullRequest.title: Add some basic Refit tests and fix an Armor location bug
pullRequest.bodyText:
To avoid another 0.47.12...and 0.47.13 fiasco, I've begun work on some basic Refit tests.
TODO:

 Validate parts are serialized/deserialized
 Validate ammo/armor are serialized/deserialized
 Validate ammo/armor is calculated
 Validate current refit class and cost calculations

nodes.bodyText: What's the .1, is that like a tolerance?

commit.message: Update tests after double checking SO
Add FLE-4 to FLE-15 test and fix Refit armor location bug
Add missing Nullable annotations per static analysis
